# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/react-pivottable`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for react-pivottable (https://github.com/plotly/react-pivottable).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/react-pivottable.

 * Dependencies: [@types/react](https://npmjs.com/package/@types/react), [@types/react-plotly.js](https://npmjs.com/package/@types/react-plotly.js)
